Tutorial: DQ Robotics with CoppeliaSim#

Note

If you’re looking for the DQ Robotics documentation, this is NOT it. For the DQ Robotics documentation, refer to this link.

Warning

This project is unofficial and under active development.

Note

This tutorial is focused on DQ Robotics for Matlab (master branch). However, some hints for Python and C++ are also included.

Warning

DQ Robotics for Matlab is distributed as a LGPLV3 licensed package. Matlab, however, is not free software and other third-party toolboxes may also not be free.

Contents#

  1. Preamble

    Install DQ Robotics and CoppeliaSim.

  2. Fundamentals on CoppeliaSim

    Some basic topics about CoppeliaSim

  3. Static world

    Some topics on non-dynamic scenes
